metaData.title: Protecting your privacy | Cancer Moonshot Biobank
metaData.OG_title: Protecting your privacy | Cancer Moonshot Biobank
metaData.description: We protect your data and your privacy by controlling who can access your information, not sharing your participation, and testing our systems regularly.
metaData.OG_description: We protect your data and your privacy by controlling who can access your information, not sharing your participation, and testing our systems regularly.

0.description: Researchers won't know your name, phone number, or where you live.
0.title: We'll never give researchers your name.

1.description: Only trained staff will see your medical information and know who you are.
1.title: Access to your personal information will be protected.

2.description: We won't tell anyone, including your health insurance company or your employer, that you're a participant in the Biobank.
2.title: We keep your participation private.

3.description: We test our systems to protect you from data breaches and other security threats.
3.title: We test our data systems to keep them secure.

4.description: They must agree to ethical and secure practices before they can use your samples and medical information.
4.title: Researchers must apply to use your samples and medical information.

5.description:
Certificate of Confidentiality
HIPPA Privacy Rule
5.title: There are laws to protect your privacy and prevent discrimination.

disclaimer: Once your information is shared with the Biobank, it may no longer be protected by patient privacy rules (like HIPAA). However, it will still be protected by other privacy rules and agreements. These include the rules and agreements that researchers must follow to access the Biobank scientific database.
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us.
